text: Really great post by @NykkiYeager on how humans and AI are merging to improve customer support & agent retention. https:// hubs.ly/H0fWBgx0 by @idiomatic_hq

Humans and AI are just going to have to get along. When it comes to customer support, keeping humans in the loop is the key to empathetic, emotionally aware support.
